<script lang="ts">
    import { RadioGroup } from "$lib/components/ui/radio-group";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        value = $bindable(),
        class: className,
        children,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof RadioGroup> = $props();
</script>

<RadioGroup 
    bind:ref 
    bind:value
    class={cn("w-full", className)} 
    {...restProps}    
>
    {@render children?.()}
</RadioGroup>

<script lang="ts">
    import { RadioGroupItem } from "$lib/components/ui/radio-group";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";
    import { getContext } from "./choicebox-context.svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        class: className,
        ...restProps
    }: Partial<ComponentProps<typeof RadioGroupItem>> = $props();

    const ctx = getContext();
</script>

<RadioGroupItem {...restProps} value={ctx.value} />

<script lang="ts">
    import * as Field from "$lib/components/ui/field";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";
    import { setupContext } from "./choicebox-context.svelte";

    let {
        id,
        value,
        class: className,
        children,
    }: Partial<ComponentProps<typeof Field.Field>> & {
        id?: string;
        value: string;
    } = $props();

    const ctx = setupContext({ id, value });
</script>

<Field.Label for={id}>
    <Field.Field class={className} orientation="horizontal">
        {@render children?.()}
    </Field.Field>
</Field.Label>

<script lang="ts">
    import { FieldDescription } from "$lib/components/ui/field";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        class: className,
        children,   
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof FieldDescription> = $props();
</script>

<FieldDescription 
    bind:ref    
    class={className} 
    {...restProps}
>
    {@render children?.()}
</FieldDescription>

<script lang="ts">
    import { FieldContent } from "$lib/components/ui/field";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        class: className,
        children,   
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof FieldContent> = $props();
</script>

<FieldContent 
    bind:ref
    class={className} 
    {...restProps}
>
    {@render children?.()}
</FieldContent>
{@render children?.()}

<script lang="ts">
    import { FieldTitle } from "$lib/components/ui/field";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {

        class: className,

        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof FieldTitle> = $props();
</script>

<FieldTitle

    class={className} 
    {...restProps} 
>
    {@render children?.()}
</FieldTitle>
